description: A heavy mattress-like armor of cloth, leather and thick linings of Kevlar, originally used as protection in bullfighting.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.
A makeshift assembly of criniere, peytral and croupiere made from biosilicified chitin fitted to a thin mesh.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.
A makeshift assembly of criniere, peytral and croupiere made from chitin fitted to a thin mesh.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.
A heavy covering of chainmail, suitably made for medium quadrupeds as protection.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.

name.str: boiled leather medium quadruped barding with caprison
name.str_pl: boiled leather medium quadruped bardings with caprison

description: A full barding for medium quadrupeds consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting a battle between a monstrous dragon and regal griffin.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.

A full barding for medium quadrupeds consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting a bear on its hind legs and forelegs outstretched in a menacing manner.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.

A full barding for medium quadrupeds consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting an assortment of fruits and vegetables with a very large orange featured in the foreground.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.

A full barding for medium quadrupeds consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting a massive vulture perched on a mountain.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.

A full barding for medium quadrupeds consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting the mythical Erymanthian boar in various artistic forms.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.

A full barding for medium quadrupeds consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison seems to be sponsored by Rycon Construction, with a tag line of "From down under to your home, we play all the roles from start to finish!".  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.

A full barding for medium quadrupeds consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison seems to be sponsored by Core Generator Tech, with a tag line of "Providing power solutions from culinary to graphic design, we have the magic touch for your problems!".  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.

name.str: boiled leather medium quadruped barding with bones
name.str_pl: boiled leather medium quadruped bardings with bones

description: Decorative bones affixed to leather medium quadruped barding to invoke fear in bandits and raiders and traders all!  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.
A thin plastic covering adapted for medium quadrupeds to protect from acid rain and other caustic sources.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.

A thin mesh interwoven with superalloy plates and pouches for military working medium quadrupeds that covers from the dewlap to the croup, down to the elbows.  You could put this on a friendly medium quadruped.
A pair of covered pouches laid across the back of a medium quadruped behind the saddle.
